item.title: Salesforce, ServiceNow Are in Talks to Invest in Genesys
item.description: Salesforce Inc. and ServiceNow Inc. are investing about $750 million apiece in Genesys Cloud Services Inc. in a rare instance of enterprise software rivals backing the same company.
